metadata.title: CVE-2024-28168 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Improper Restriction of XML External Entity Reference ('XXE') vulnerabilityin Apache XML Graphics FOP.This issue affects Apache XML Graphics FOP: 2.9.Users are recommended to upgrade to version 2.10, which fixes the issue.

criterions.comment: fop package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
